ModName.Chinese: 商品中立贸易者的优选商品

Description.Chinese: 从其他地图向中立贸易者添加 2-4 个新的优选商品（他们将为此支付更多费用）
Description.English: Adds 2-4 new preferred goods per merchant from other sessions to merchants (they will pay more for these)
Description.French: Adds 2-4 new preferred goods per merchant from other sessions to merchants (they will pay more for these)
Description.German: Fügt 2-4 neue bevorzugte Waren pro Händler aus anderen Sessions zu den Händlern hinzu (sie zahlen für diese einen höheren Preis)
Description.Italian: Adds 2-4 new preferred goods per merchant from other sessions to merchants (they will pay more for these)
Description.Korean: Adds 2-4 new preferred goods per merchant from other sessions to merchants (they will pay more for these)
Description.Polish: Adds 2-4 new preferred goods per merchant from other sessions to merchants (they will pay more for these)
Description.Russian: Adds 2-4 new preferred goods per merchant from other sessions to merchants (they will pay more for these)
Description.Spanish: Adds 2-4 new preferred goods per merchant from other sessions to merchants (they will pay more for these)
